Theme:  Movies Of Satyajit Ray
Inspiration: Goopy Gyne Bagha Byne 
#brainstorming #adobeillustrator #portfolio #fashiondesign
data.text:
Youtube tutorial videos never help! :( Unless you actually concentrating and taking notes of information that is relevant to you. :) Below is a BTS video of a project that I am going to render. After watch a few "How to get cinematic camera shot" videos I have made a few tweak to what I usually do for camera placement and focus length. I will be share the rest of my update over the next coming weeks.

Fred the Dog in Once Upon a Weiner (Storyboard Video 2000 VHS) Prior to animating, and after the script, the story needs to be blocked out via storyboards before the drawing phase of cartooning. I did my best to time the storyboards with the cartoon so you could see how the layout worked on the final product. You can also see how some of the colors changed for the backgrounds and what was included in the storyboards and what was not. The captions beneath the storyboards might go by too quick to read but, again, I was trying to time the storyboards with the cartoon itself so feel free to pause where need to read the storyboards. Anyway, this is some behind-the-scenes stuff for you and a bit about what goes into making a cartoon. Enjoy. Don't forget to subscribe to stay up to date on all the latest videos. Thank you for watching Axiom-man TV. https://lnkd.in/gEy9VeDk Keep up to date with all the latest news from A.P. Fuchs at http://www.canisterx.com Check out his webcomic, FREDRIKUS, about an anthropomorphic dog in a dystopian sci-fi world at http://www.fredrikus.com His weekly newsletter, The Canister X Transmission, goes out Saturdays. Subscribe free at https://lnkd.in/gNVVm7N LinkTree: https://linktr.ee/apfuchs Join him on his Patreon journey for serial novels, essays, behind-the-scenes stuff, and more at https://lnkd.in/gwp4Ghj #Fredrikus #storyboard #dog #anthropomorphicdog #cartoons #animation #2Danimation #2D #oldanimation #comiccharacters #animalanimation #animated #animateddog #dogcartoons #behindthescenes
